parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Feature fillet option as defined in swFeatureFilletOptions_e

parameters.name: R1
parameters.description: Radius for uniform radius edge fillet

parameters.name: Ftyp
parameters.description: Type of fillet as defined in swFeatureFilletType_e

parameters.name: OverflowType
parameters.description: Control of fillet overflowing onto adjacent surfaces as defined in swFilletOverFlowType_e

title: IFeatureManager.FilletXpertChange
description: Changes the parameters on the selected filleted faces, regardless of whether the filleted faces were created manually or with FilletXpert, provided that FilletXpert can process them.
signature:
Feature FilletXpertChange( 
   System.Int32
Options
,
   System.Double
R1
,
   System.Int32
Ftyp
,
   System.Int32
OverflowType
)

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Feature fillet option as defined in swFeatureFilletOptions_e

parameters.name: R1
parameters.description: Radius for uniform radius edge fillet

parameters.name: Ftyp
parameters.description: Type of fillet as defined in swFeatureFilletType_e

parameters.name: OverflowType
parameters.description: Control of fillet overflowing onto adjacent surfaces as defined in swFilletOverFlowType_e
